headline: Is It Too Late To Consider DaVita (DVA) After Its Sharp 30 Day Surge
summary: For investors considering whether DaVita at around US$150.73 represents attractive value or appears expensive after its recent run, this article focuses on what the current price could mean for long-term investors. The stock has returned 1.2% over the last 7 days, 39.4% over the last 30 days, 31.6% year to date and 5.8% over the last year, with longer-term returns of 83.1% over 3 years and 47.6% over 5 years that may shape how the market is currently thinking about risk and reward. Recent...
